# set up 
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
```

# load in data 
```{r}
# imports ACS dataframe 
df <- read.csv("thesisDF.csv")
```

# makes into panel 

```{r}
df_panel <- panel_data(df, id = fips, wave = year)
df_panel

summary(df_panel)

# my vars select 
myvars <- c("mean_mean_nom_housing_value", "mean_mean_nom_contract_rent") # see which to incl 

df_panel_sum <- df_panel[myvars]

sumStats <- summary(df_panel, mean_mean_nom_housing_value, mean_mean_nom_contract_rent, rent_price_ratio, year)
datatable(sumStats)
```
